metadata.title: CVE-2016-0839 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - high
metadata.description: post_proc/volume_listener.c in mediaserver in Android 6.x before 2016-04-01mishandles deleted effect context, which allows remote attackers to executearbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via acrafted media file, aka internal bug 25753245.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
